#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
int main(void)
{
  int t=0;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t>0)
  {
    int S,m,w,c;
    scanf("%d %d %d %d",&S,&m,&w,&c);
    int m1=0,w1=0,c1=0;
    while(S>0)
    {
      if((m1+w1)>c1/4 && c1<c)
      {c1++;S--;continue;}
      if(m1>w1/2 && w1<w)
      {w1++;S--;continue;}
      if(m1<m){m1++;S--;continue;}
      break;
    }
    printf("%d %d %d\n",m1,w1,c1);
    t--;
  }
}
